title: Ticket #1852: condor_procd EXCEPTs on garbage input
description: If a client writes unexpected information to the procd's pipe, either through it being garbage, or a different protocol version, the procd EXCEPTS. It should be fixed that the procd just logs the wrong attempt to talk to it and keeps running.
remarks:
2011-Feb-01 16:20:02 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.
